string.text: Greetings, who are you?

Greetings, Im a former Military man... I do a little trading... But my goods are specific - I sell rare embryos for activating anomalies. I also sell PSI antidotes and serum, very rare items in the zone!
Well, I see many military men often turn into dealers. It is not an easy life in the Ukrainian military. What's your name? I am known as "Marked One."

My name is Akim, pleasant to get acquainted. Yes in the military it's a rough life, and the retirement pension is worse. Now I trade, resell, and buy. In general I don't bargain so don't bother. I've come to the zone to make my fortune and then I'll get out of this hell hole. Stalkers sometimes sell artefacts in the form of a Shell.. they can activate anomalies. Look at your PDA, there should be some information. By the way, I have a colleage in the Agroprom northern complex who sells wares similar to what I offer. He has a lot of helpful information. If you're looking for work there's a guy I know who has settled down by the helicopter in the Forgotten wood.
Listen, I heard about a strange jacket. While wearing it you can sneak up and steal close from the enemy, have you heard about such a jacket?

Yes, I know of it. Only, it's not a jacket, it's an Exoskeleton. I know that it went missing after the last scientific expedition to the Zone center. It is not difficult to guess that it's now in Bandit's possesion. My intelligence officer has told me it's in the ATP. I sent a sqaud there to retrieve it, but i never heard from them again. I can't spare anymore men at the moment, but I know approximately where it is. It's in an attic of one of the buildings. If you could find this exoskeleton? I will be very grateful!
I can't guarantee anything, but if I am in that territory I will look for it. However, if I find it, I might need to use it myself for awhile.
Well I don't like the sound of this. Find someone else, my skin is more important than an Exoskeleton.
Greetings chief. I have found the Exoskeleton. A first class piece!
Yes!! You have brought it?
Here you are.
Well done! Here's your reward.
Greetings, who are you?
Greetings, I am the local dealer. I specialize in unique wares. Such as Nodes which you can turn into anomalies. I also sell serum and the rare antidotes for PSI sickness.
Yes, I spoke with Akim about you. Do you jack up the prices alot?
This means Akim has not yet forgotten about his workmate! And the prices are decent. You will also find my goods are specific and rare!
Greetings Adrenalin, I'm trying to find better weapons for my campaign to the center of the zone. Can you help?
Greetings, I can't offer much in weaponry, except maybe a really good sniper rifle...
Sounds really expensive... Money and artifacts are in short supply at the moment.
For the sniper rifle, money won't be enough! However, there is a way you can earn it.
How do I do that?

I need you to visit the scientist in Yantar. You call him Sakharov... Talk to him about the Military commander who somtimes comes for business. I have an order for a Minigun I need you to pick up. It's an easy job, you want it?
I could use a good sniper rifle and this doesn't sound too dangerous. Yes, I'll do it.
Drag a heavy Minigun across the Zone, no thanks!
Hello, Adrenalin!
Did you bring the weapon?
Yes, here you are. I'm glad to get that weight off my back.
Excellent Marked One! Here take this sniper rifle, and you can have this artifact also.
Im looking for some work, do you have any jobs?
Work??? I've got plenty of work, you've came to the right place stalker. First lets see if you have the stomach for the job. Bring to me 10 zombie hands. you up for that??
Wow, zombie hands! I didn't expect you to ask for something like that.
It's a strange strange world stalker, and by the look of your clothes I would say your in a financial crisis.
It certainly is a strange world, even stranger when you can't remember who you are.
Well stalker, do I have a new employee? If I can offer a bit of advice about zombie hunting, you gotta shoot em in the head!
Shoot em in the head? something tells me Ive heard that before! Yea, I'll take the job.
Get ten zombie hands!!! No Way!
I found the 10 zombie hands. Strange how the finger nails grew an inch while they were in my backpack.
I'm going to have to give them a pedicure before I can ship them out! Ha, Ha. Thanks. Here's your reward. Lets see about the nails... Oh, look how crookedly I have cut the nails!
While your doing your nails, I'm gonna wash my backpack.
You really need to buy a new knife... It looks like you chewed the hands off!
What's next Dr. Frankenstein? Im ready to do another job.

Did you get some new armor?, or maybe you just had a shower? Your starting to resemble a modern stalker! There is this one job though, I've learned that there are documents which will enable me to create something important.
Sounds better already, no body parts! What do I need to do?
No body parts this time, I just need the documents.
Where do I search for these documents?
The documents are located on a roof in the Garbage. Could be a building, a bus, or a shipping container. It's impossible to read the other part of the note.
On a roof? It would be just as easy to say somewhere in the Garbage. Ok at least it's not zombie hands!
What do you think I am, a police dog? Find your own piece of paper.
I risked my ass for this piece of paper? Here's your documents and don't forget my reward!
And what ass did you risk? Did you shit your pants? I said on a roof, not in a manure heap!
Risk! What do you know about risk?
Calm down, it's a joke! Here's your reward.
Greetings, I have come for more work. I need resources for a distant campaign, and the barman won't give me anything.
I too won't give out credit to you. However, I need your help. Those documents that you brought are only the first half of the full document file. There is also a second part.
So you need those parts also?.
You catch on quick...
Ok, Listen, where do I search for the second part of the documents?
calm, down, try the Agroprom underground.
I will try to find them, but I think I should be paid more...
Akim, We'll see about it. Go to the Agropom underground and we'll talk later.
Here's your documents. You could have been a bit more exact with the location. I'm not telepathic nor am I Sherlock Holmes.

Yes, I see that you've crinkled the documents... Please fold them neatly and put them in your backpack instead of stuffing them into your pockets! haha! I'm joking my good fellow. Thanks! Here's your reward.
Thanks, and I've got plenty of brains. Even some to spare, looks like you could use some!
You're easy to wind up, stalker.
Hello Akim. How's trade? I don't see stalkers lining up to buy your goods.

Greetings, Marked One. It's about the qaulity of the sales not the quantity. Once again I need you help. Wind in X-18... I can't find anybody willing to go there... And to risk my own expensive head is out of the question.
Akim what are you babbling about? Wind in X-18?!!! Is the sun deck open? We should go there for vacation and live the high life! I will go, but you will pay well for the 'Sun Deck' adventure!
The blessing of money, Marked One. These documents could put me on the fast-track to that beach paradise that awaits me when I leave the zone!
Now I understand your ramblings. Let's get down to business, gimme the details.

Well, studying the second part of the documents has led me to the third part. I have found out that somebody called Korchagin previously had this document. He divided it into four parts. In X-18 there are three parts of the document. The fourth is somewhere outside the lab, but within the compound. I need them all. I promise my gratitude will not know borders!
Ok, Let's test the 'borders' of your gratitude.
I've had enough of underground labs, go yourself!
I have the documents. It wasn't an easy task, but I found some interesting loot.
This excellent. Now I have enough information.
Akim, stop drooling on the documents. Give me my reward!!!!
It is fine, it's fine. Here, take this, you earned it!
Greetings, I see you have now mastered the alphabet by reading all the secret documents.

Greetings, after X-18 your crinkles have absolutely ceased! I need your services again... I need you go to lab X-16 and find one more document. I also need you to bring a PDA from Borov's base in the Dark Valley.
Akim, why do you need all these documents? Your like a gambler chasing a winning hand.
The details of my motivations are not for your concern.
My mind can wander sometimes, but I'm smarter than you think. So tell me the details of this task.

I was mistaken, I thought that after lab X-18 you were not on friendly terms with your own mind. But now I can see it's a condition you've had since childhood. On to the business at hand, one part of the key that you have brought back from lab X-18 appears to not be the last part of the puzzle. It did however shed light on a new document and a PDA which holds essential data. I know the approximate location of the PDA. You should search around the crane in front of Borov's base. The document should also be in the control room of lab X-16. There is more... I need one each of the following armors:\n Military CKAT-10, Stalker Exoskeleton, a Bandit Exoskeleton, and a "Duty" Scientific Suit.
I see. You're trying to update your shop at my expense? I accept. But it may take some time to gather all this gear.
You're asking too much this time... Im leaving.
Where should I unload the truck? Are you sure you don't want to add Cinderella's shoe to the list? Here's your gear!!!

I didn't expect you to find it! OK, I'll tell you what I have learned. These instructions will help me to obtain a new Exoskeleton. There is a trail version in the Zone somewhere. I'll give you the detailed instructions, but don't lose this confidential data... If you lose it, you will understand it's true importantance! Good luck.
Great! I appreciate the instructions, it looks very useful!
When you find it, inform me on how it works.
Greetings trading Guru! Long live the fair deceit of stalkers!!!
I think you had many problems as a child... Can you find some parts of mutants, one of each.. I need everything except zombie hands. I'm sure this won't be a difficult task for you.
Why do you want such a collection? Planning a buffet night?
By the way, after you leave the Zone, I suggest you apply for work at the Post Office. Without a gun in your hands, licking stamps is the only skill I think you posess! I will await the spare parts.
The only stamps I would paste would be on your forehead. By the way, that's not a bad idea!
Listen, it's about time you visited the The Doctor. Let him give you a good enema to clean out your brains that are clogging up your arse. Are You going to collect parts of mutants or not?
I'll give you an enema with a flamethrower! Yes, I'll gather the mutant parts.
No Akim, it's time for you to do your own work.
Greetings, Collector. I have brought the full set. Get your knife and forks!
I asked you to bring spare parts. What sloppy butchery, you brought whole arms instead of hands! and what's with the whole cat?
Here's a hand, there's a foot, there's a tail. What's not here? You can make jelly from the remains!
Oh God, I'm just gonna stay silent... Here, take the reward.
What the hell are you doing way out here? Collecting mushrooms?, haha.

Greetings Stalker, I am "Crest". Oh, and just for the record mushrooms don't grow here. I've come here for artifacts. There are lots of them but unfortunately not the ones I'm looking for. Will you help me collect them? I need fifteen artifacts, five pieces of each kind: Medusa, Stone Flower, and Fireball
Fifteen artefacts? That's a big task for any stalker. Tell me why I just shouldn't walk away and just forget I ever met you?
Yes it's a big job!, but I promise the reward will be worth it!
I don't know, that's a lot of radiation to be carrying around in my backpack and besides, I'm a busy man.

Well Stalker, look around. You can see I've come equiped. I'm someone you can trust and that's an uncommon thing in the Zone. Make the right friends and you never know how useful they might become in the future.
Yes there's so much deceit and betrayal in the Zone and I hope you're speaking truthfully! I will bring the fifteen artefacts and of course, I will expect payment...
Crest, collect them yourself. That's too much radiation to be carrying around.
Greetings Crest. Here, take your artefacts. This amount of radiation is unhealthy. I don't want to become impotent!
Great job, Marked One!. Thanks! Judging by the fourteen artefacts on your belt, you've already had too much radiation exposure! I suspect you might already be impotent. Here's your award.
What the hell do you know about impotence!
Calm down, don't get angry. It's something to think about... If you stay in the Zone too long, you'll end up drooling like a Zombie... Picking your nose all day...
Greetings.

Once again the hero of the Zone has come to visit... There's a job for you! Yesterday, the military raided me and took all my artefacts! Well atleast the ones I didn't have stashed! They also drank my Vodka! I think it's necessary to punish them...
Punish Military men?!, yea, you're right! It seems they did drink all the vodka! Bastards! Have you thought about the consequences though? I after all, am not really a killer for hire.
I'm not asking you to kill anyone! Can you get me some of thier weaponry? I need six Bisons, and then I can hire some men to give them something to think about next time they raid someone.
Oh, you mean I approach them say: Hey, Soldiers!, give me six Bisons! an they'll just give them to me?!
My reward is 40,000ru, and an aditional reward also. However you get the guns is up to you. If you agree, I will eagerly wait for them like a teenage boy craves for young girls.
OK I will do it. That's a lot of money, and so far I've picked up a couple of Bison's on my travels. Most likley I will find more!
No, I'm not looking for trouble with the military. These people will send helicopters to blast me to pieces, then pseudodogs will feast on my brains!
Here, I have brought the Bisons. But no young girls for you!
Fantastic Marked One! Here's your award.
These are deadly weapons! I should know! I've been in thier sights more times than I care to remember!
I Hope that it wasn't too difficult? Though that's probably a useless question.
Are you the local Tarzan, or are you here to trade with the Chimeras?
You make jokes Marked One, good to see the Zone hasn't taken your sense of humor. I have a task for you. Ah! I see your eyes have lit up!
The thought of earning elite artefacts make my eyes shine very brightly! What's the task?

There is a military man who went missing in these woods. He has a teleporter that I would like to examine. I know he stayed in these woods last night because the teleporter is defective. He described his position on the radio as being next to some big stones and a recently abandoned car. I met a Stalker yesterday who said his car had broken down in the northern part of the woods. It's not far from here. Find the soldier and bring me the teleporter... I'll reward you for it!
Something stinks! What kind of mess are you sending me into?
This teleporter is important to me. it's a necessary risk.
Necessary for ME to take the risk, more like it. I will look for it.
Crest. Do you milk wild boars? Don't piss me off, understand?
I've found the teleporter, only it doesn't work. Here take it.
I knew you would try to use it. I told you it didn't work. I will repair it. And what happened to the military man?
Mutants must have killed him recently.

Thanks Marked One. Here's your reward. By the way, under the device's cover there's a stamp which says'Prototype 2'. Meaning theres another copy still in the Zone somewhere. If you find it, it's yours. Judging by the markings, both devices were made in the ATP. That's where I'd start looking... There's also more evidence.. By monitoring the local Bandit's radio traffic, they are expecting to be raided by the military and have hidden some of thier loot. It would be wise to look in the Garbage containers in the ATP. you'll certianly find something there.
